page.title: 14THE 2ND SANDY BROWNIE PACK
page.content: I GO TO A BROWNIE PACK AT ROBERT PEEL SCHOOL ON WEDNESDAYS. IT IS THE 2ND SANDY BROWNIE PACK. WE DO INTERESTING THINGS LIKE MAKING THINGS, HAVING FILMS AND VISITING PLACES. WE ALSO WORK FOR OUR BADGES. WHEN YOU GET ENROLLED YOU HAVE TO MAKE THE BROWNIE PROMISE. IT SAYS, "I PROMISE THAT I WILL DO MY BEST TO DO MY DUTY TO GOD, TO SERVE THE QUEEN AND HELP OTHERS, AND TO KEEP THE BROWNIE PACK PROMISE." THE BROWNIE MOTTO IS "A BROWNIE GUIDE THINKS OF OTHERS BEFORE HERSELF AND DOES A GOOD TURN EVERYDAY." I STARTED BROWNIES WHEN I WAS EIGHT AND WHEN I AM TEN I WILL GO UP TO GUIDES. THERE ARE SEVERAL OTHER BROWNIE PACKS IN SANDY. WE GO TO BROWNIES TO MAKE FRIENDS. THE BROWNIE CANDLE IS A SIGN OF FRIENDSHIP.
